data.name: Pixel Sand
data.detailed_description:
Want to watch a house being sucked into a black hole?
Want to shoot lasers at a frozen lake?
Want to set off a nuclear bomb with the sole purpose of destroying bees?

Welcome to the world of Pixel Sand!

Here are some buzzwords that our marketing department told us not to use:

8 Chapter Campaign - wow
Sandbox Mode - what is that?
Networked Multiplayer - it kinda works
Kids Mode - let them bash keyboards
Procedurally Generated World Mode - oh great another one?
Downloadable Mods - lol nerds
________________________________________________________________________

Pixel Sand is a fantasy physics platformer of epic indie proportions. Drawing inspiration from Dan-Ball's Powder Game and other games like Falling Sand, World of Sand, & Powder Toy, we've added to the genre with a familiar player named Vuhrne and a ground breaking story. Solve engaging puzzles and experiment with hundreds of elements as you explore your way through the world in campaign mode, or join a friend and create a universe together that is entirely your own. Share your designs with the world in our online mod community and download mod content for endless hours of entertainment.

data.short_description: Mix elements like a mad scientist on a particularly spicy date with destiny! Embark on a journey through the mystical caves of Dormacom with our hero Vurhne as he seeks out the ultimate power for no good reason at all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.x / 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz with 2 cores
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 10 Video Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.x / 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz with 4 cores
  • Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 11 Video Card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible
